group_1.narration: According to what the employee lady said,@the truck carrying ingredients@doesn't seem to be coming.
The truck was loaded with ingredients for@"Adult's Spicy Curry: The Chicken Veggie"@and other curry sauces...

group_1.textLeft: The manager decided that the store is in@no condition to open.

group_1.textRight: Tchhh! What a waste of time!
Alright, we'll give it up today and head to Banbanzai.
We'll stop by tomorrow then.

group_1.textLeft: Uu...uu...UUUWAAAAAAN!

group_1.textRight: W-what's wrong?@Today was just bad luck, but we'll come tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: I WANT TO OPEN TODAAAY!!!
MY PRECIOUS FAMILY! THEY'RE COMING@ALL THE WAY FROM THE COUNTRYSIIIDE!

group_1.narration: According to her story, the employee lady@joined CoCoIchi after graduating high school@and was already chosen to be part of the opening staff.@She's a promising young member with big hopes.
And today it seems@family members who have been supporting her made@schedule changes to come all the way out to see her.
However, if the shop isn't open...@You can't help but feel bad for her.

group_1.textLeft: ...I wonder if there's anything we can do.

group_1.textRight: Right on! Iroha!@We'll go find it!

B-but...isn't this something the police should...@[chara:100401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:100401:lipSynch_1][chara:100401:cheek_0][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100401:motion_0]Mm? H-huh...?

group_1.textLeft: You noticed it? That strange feeling of unease.@I sense magic flowing from this store.

group_1.textRight: It's still giving an intense feeling...@Was something left inside...?
You mean a Witch or Magical Girl@did something bad?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, guess it's our time to shine!
I'll smash them bad guys with a bang!
Yeah, you're right.

group_1.textRight: Miss, please cheer up.
If you have time to cry, then you ought to get@your shop ready to open.
It doesn't seem like we'll be in time for the opening,@but...
There ain't nothing like gobbling down a meal@in a hurry.

group_1.textLeft: W-what do you mean...?

group_1.textRight: We will definitely find that truck for you.

group_1.textLeft: You're serious?!@But, how in the world will youâ€”

group_1.textRight: It's a secret.@However, will you still trust us?

group_1.textLeft: E-even if you say you will...@[chara:800600:lipSynch_0].....[wait:0.5][chara:800600:lipSynch_1][chara:800600:cheek_0][chara:800600:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]*Gasp*?!

group_1.narration: This is the person who was talking up@CoCoIchi earlier with her extensive knowledge,@almost like she was trying to advertise for us.
That is, without a doubt,@an act only one who loves CoCoIchi would do...

group_1.textLeft: .....[wait:1.0][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]Got it.@I'll believe...please let me believe.

group_1.textRight: (I think there was...@A misunderstanding just now...)

group_1.textLeft: Ah, but I don't have any money...

group_1.textRight: No, wait, we're not doing this for money.

group_1.textLeft: ...Then please at least let me treat you to@our store's curry.

group_1.textRight: Serious?!@Even the toppings?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Load them up as you please!
I'll prepare enough for six people!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle*... There's no greater reward that this.
Okay, everyone, move out!

group_1.textLeft: It may be sudden, but here's@the Lucky Topping Corner!
We will be introducing various CoCoIchi toppings@here every time.
And after that, we will announce the lucky forecast@of the day!

group_1.textRight: A brilliant plan.

group_1.textLeft: Today's topping is...@Did you want to decide it, Yachiyo?

group_1.textRight: May I? Well, then...
How about the seafood and fish fry combo?

group_1.textLeft: So we have two toppings.

group_1.textRight: Though you say two, inside the seafood is shrimp,@squid, and clams,
so it feels like you rule the entire ocean.

group_1.textLeft: And now the fortune!@Today, if you order the seafood and fish fry...
Your catch rate at the fishing pond may increase@by 1.2 times!

group_1.textRight: Those who want to rule over the fishing pond,@come on in to CoCoIchi!

group_1.textLeft: Up next is the Login Bonus Corner!
